name: Battlefleet Gust Wind
description:
The solar system was invaded by aliens of unknown origin. The earth has fallen. As the commander of the surviving space fleet, return to the solar system from outer space and save the earth.

Game Play
Initially the players were just ordinary space fighters， Collect resources by fighting alien invaders and return to base to build larger warships, Occupy alien bases to gain tech points and develop new forts, ammunition, and warships. Recover all the planets of the solar system from Pluto and save the planet.

In combat, players need to take control of their own warships or fighters, breaking through alien defenses, Control warship movement, main gun attack and upgrade, installation of auxiliary turrets .

Feature
  • From frigates, destroyers, cruisers, battleships to aircraft carriers, there are five classes of ships.
  • From kinetic energy weapons, live ammunition weapons, particle weapons, sonic weapons, chemical weapons to nuclear weapons, six different weapons and equipment.
  • From Pluto to the sun, traverse the solar system and defeat the invaders on every planet
  • Custom ship system, every turret on the ship is customized by you.
